name: Tet Nguyen Dan
description: The Vietnamese Lunar New Year, marking the arrival of spring. It is the most important celebration in Vietnamese culture.

name: Hoi An Lantern Festival
description: Held on the 14th day of every lunar month, the town turns off electric lights and is illuminated by thousands of colorful lanterns.

name: Hue Festival
description: A biennial festival honoring the cultural heritage of the ancient imperial capital with art, theater, and royal ceremonies.

name: Yi Peng Lantern Festival
description: The famous festival where thousands of paper lanterns are released into the night sky to symbolize letting go of misfortunes.
